name: Slime 'n' Yoyo
description:
Slime has a yoyo! That's about all the plot there is, go through each of the 3 levels and collect as many coins as you can!

Use WASD to control Slime, Slime can't move on the ground, so hold and release W to make them jump!

Use the arrow keys to control the yoyo, Up will push the yoyo away from slime, When the yoyo is at it's furthest point, press up again to send it across Slime's body. You can also press Left and Right when the yoyo is still to fling it side to side

Made for the VimJam Game Jam

Credits:

"Graphics" & Programming: FlaringK (That's me!)
Font: Wet Dreamz by Wesley Pastrana
